channel.title: Runner hat replaces gate
channel.description:
i got a client and where the gates are ment to be there are runner hats
i dont mean gates i mean fences

item.title: Runner hat replaces gate
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

You could go into your class 8 and just change the ID of the hats to something different, right now it has the id of the fences, and loads the fences models so if you change the id to something else it wont have the id of the fences and therefore fixing it without all the hassle of renaming or moving models.

Read full topic

item.title: Runner hat replaces gate
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

go to your class8 and find runner hat

under the running hats id find something like this

class8.anInt200 = 5409;
class8.anInt165 = 5409;
class8.anInt174 = 5412; go into your models / preloading models and move the files rename them to other numbers
then change the last number there to whatever you named the models and put them back

but this is the improper way so you might wanna back up your file

Read full topic
